titles.title: To modify the annual report on military and security developments involving the Russian Federation.
To modify the annual report on military and security developments involving the Russian Federation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: This bill requires the Department of Defense to include in an annual report to Congress information pertaining to Russian private military companies, including how such military companies are being used to advance Russia's political, economic, and military interests.
